references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This paper introduces Latent Diffusion Models (LDM), which significantly improved the efficiency and output resolution of diffusion models, becoming a default choice for many subsequent works in text-to-image generation.
This paper replaces the U-Net architecture in diffusion models with a transformer-based architecture, demonstrating impressive quality and scalability.

references.paper_title: Dreambooth: Fine tuning text-to-image diffusion models for subject-driven generation
references.reason: This paper introduces subject-driven generation capability by fine-tuning text-to-image diffusion models, serving as a fundamental method in personalized image generation and is used as a benchmark in the paper.

references.paper_title: Ip-adapter: Text compatible image prompt adapter for text-to-image diffusion models
references.reason: This paper introduces an image prompt adapter for text-to-image diffusion models, achieving subject-driven generation without further fine-tuning for new concepts.

references.paper_title: Objects365: A large-scale, high-quality dataset for object detection
references.reason: This paper introduces a large-scale, high-quality dataset for object detection used as a basis for the taxonomy tree in the in-context data generation pipeline.
